message.body: I'm am overtired delirious and overworked by rabbis and funeral directors otherwise I would call. Sorry. Awkward text.
The service is tomorrow at Levine's on beacon street at 3pm. We are taking her to israel per her final request on Sunday.
I am so sorry Michal! Itâ€™s ok. Not an awkward text. I cannot imagine how exhausting this must be. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to help.
Sophie!!!!!! Sorry I don't reply!! Were you there today? Sorry I was dazed! But then didn't see you at my grandpas so don't know!
